name: K5 CAPITAL
desc: K5 Capital Group (also operating as K5 Kapital) is a Louisville, Kentucky-based alternative business lender founded in 2021. The company provides debt financing facilities including merchant cash advances, short-term loans, revolving credit lines, and unsecured debt to small and middle-market companies. K5 Kapital emphasizes fast funding with no collateral required, approving applicants despite low credit scores or high debt ratios. The firm uses revenue-based repayment with automatic deductions that adjust to card sales. With approximately 20 employees across operations in Louisville, Lexington, and Austin, Texas, K5 Capital is a growing player in the alternative financing space.
full_address: 10200 Forest Green Blvd Ste 112, Louisville, KY 40223

leaders.bg: Evan Caffee serves as President of K5 Capital Group, leading the company's lending operations from Louisville, Kentucky. He is one of the key decision-makers at the firm and oversees the company's alternative financing strategy and growth across multiple markets.
hooks: K5 Capital's expansion from Louisville to Austin — what drove that growth strategy

hooks: K5's approach to credit risk assessment for businesses with challenging profiles

name: KASH4BIZ
desc: Kash4Biz LLC is a micro business advance company incorporated in August 2018, headquartered in Sheridan, Wyoming. The company specializes in providing micro business advances ranging from $1,000 to $10,000, targeting small businesses and self-employed individuals with fluctuating income or lower credit scores. Kash4Biz's automated approval system delivers funding decisions in under two minutes, with typical application-to-funding time of less than two hours. Repayment typically occurs over 8-12 weeks through small automatic debits. The company was created to help businesses that don't qualify for traditional bank financing or need immediate funding. Key team includes Jeff Myatt as COO and Richard Sablon as CTO.
full_address: 30 N Gould St Ste 2021, Sheridan, WY 82801

leaders.bg: Jeff Myatt serves as Chief Operating Officer of Kash4Biz, overseeing day-to-day operations of the micro business advance platform. He is also associated with Bitty Advance, another micro-lending company, bringing experience in small-dollar business financing and fintech operations.

leaders.bg: Richard Sablon is the Chief Technology Officer of Kash4Biz, responsible for building and maintaining the company's automated lending technology platform. He attended Miami Dade College and brings technical expertise to the company's fast-approval lending infrastructure.

name: KINETIC FUNDING
desc: Kinetic Funding LLC is a national equipment and working capital financing company that provides hassle-free financing solutions for growing businesses. The company offers 100% financing for all credit types, serving various industries throughout the United States. Kinetic Funding specializes in equipment financing, vehicle financing, and software financing, as well as working capital solutions including merchant cash advances. The company operates a vendor program that combines financial tools with rapid processing at no cost to vendors, collaborating with businesses of all sizes without imposing multi-million dollar annual volume commitments. Kinetic Funding positions itself as a flexible lender that works with all credit profiles.

name: LENDIN CHECK
desc: LENDin Check Inc. is a technology-driven merchant cash advance platform founded in 2019 that provides an automated funding experience for small business owners. The company offers unsecured, quick-funding MCA products that allow business owners to receive funding against future sales without strict credit requirements. Most MCAs through LENDin Check are closed and funded within 1-2 business days, compared to months for traditional bank loans. The company positions itself as purchasing future receivables at a discount rather than charging interest rates, and is dedicated to building long-lasting customer relationships while giving merchants control over their advances. LENDin Check emphasizes its tech-driven platform as a modern alternative to traditional business lending.

leaders.bg: Limited public information available about LENDin Check's leadership. The company was founded in 2019 with a focus on building a technology-driven automated MCA platform for small business funding.

name: LOAN23
desc: Loan23 Inc. is a Miami, Florida-based financial services company founded in 2023 by Alexey Serbinov and Vladimir Chamovskikh. The company is dedicated to empowering small business owners by providing customized funding solutions including short-term loans, lines of credit, merchant cash advances, SBA loans, and invoice factoring. Loan23 operates from 444 Brickell Ave in Miami's financial district and requires a minimum annual revenue of $50,000 for eligibility. Vladimir Chamovskikh serves as CEO and has founded 5 successful companies across different industries. Co-founder Alexey Serbinov is a member of a bank's board of directors and has served on the boards of 50 different companies. The company has not yet raised external venture funding.

name: MCA FUND
desc: MCA Fund (operating as MCAFund.com at mymcafund.com) is a merchant cash advance platform that pools accredited investor funds to provide financing to new and established businesses. The management team has facilitated over $300 million in funding for customers since 2011, demonstrating significant experience in the MCA space. The platform currently offers investors an 18% annualized return paid quarterly with a 2-year lock-up period, with an additional 2% return available for reinvestment. MCA Fund's business model prioritizes investor returns ahead of management compensation, differentiating it from typical MCA fund structures. The company operates both as a direct funder and as a syndication platform, providing unique products and funding approvals for businesses seeking capital.

leaders.bg: The MCA Fund management team has facilitated over $300 million in funding since 2011, bringing extensive experience in merchant cash advance origination, syndication, and portfolio management across a 13+ year track record.

name: Meta Advance Financial
desc: Meta Advance Financial is a merchant cash advance provider offering MCAs ranging from $10,000 to $200,000 with 6 to 12 month terms. The company provides business funding through the purchase of future receivables, automatically deducting a set percentage of credit and debit card sales via ACH or Lockbox until the advance is recovered. Business owners averaging a minimum of $7,500 per month in sales over the last three months typically qualify for funding equal to 70-120% of their volume, ranging from $3,000 to $500,000. Meta Advance Financial positions itself as offering relatively lower than average fees compared to the broader MCA market, with approval and funding in as little as 2 business days.

leaders.bg: Limited public information is available about Meta Advance Financial's leadership team. The company operates as an MCA provider with funding amounts from $10,000 to $200,000 and positions itself with lower-than-average fees in the MCA space.
hooks: Meta Advance Financial's positioning as a lower-fee MCA provider — how does that work economically

ACH and Lockbox collection. Application requires: 3 months bank statements, 4 months merchant statements, lease copy, business license. Limited leadership info publicly available.

name: MGM FUNDING ENTERPRISES
desc: MGM Funding Enterprises Incorporated is an Orlando, Florida-based business funding company incorporated on January 19, 2022. The company is registered at 7001 Burnway Drive in Orlando and operates as a Florida Profit Corporation. MGM Funding Enterprises provides business financing services including merchant cash advances and working capital solutions. The registered agent is Menachem Gollub. Related entities in the MGM funding ecosystem include MGM Capital Funding, which offers same-day working capital approvals up to $2,000,000 across multiple products including term loans, SBA loans, factoring, asset-based lending, lines of credit, and equipment financing. MGM Funding Enterprises makes quick underwriting decisions based on multiple factors, with personal credit being the least important consideration.

name: NEW YORK TRIBECA
desc: New York Tribeca Group LLC is a leading private lending firm incorporated in 2017 and headquartered in New York City. Led by CEO Gabriel Shuster, the firm provides flexible funding solutions for small and medium-sized businesses, including merchant cash advances, working capital financing, and equipment financing. Funding amounts range from $20,000 to $1 million with swift application processing and decisions in hours. The company has approximately 68 employees and generates an estimated $10M-$50M in annual revenue. In one notable partnership, NYTG generated over $14 million in total funding in an eight-month period, resulting in $1.7 million in commissions. The company is BBB accredited and operates from 40 Wall St in Manhattan's financial district.
full_address: 40 Wall St, Floor 43, New York, NY 10005
